name: Vladimir putin
testimony: Never have I seen such bald and shameless attempts at garnering an audiences' approval through frosted deliciousness.

name: Nelson Mandela
testimony: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall

name: Walt Disney
testimony: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

name: Steve Jobs
testimony: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

name: Eleanor Roosevelt
testimony: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor

name: Oprah Winfrey
testimony: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.

name: James Cameron
testimony: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.

name: John Lennon
testimony: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
